help-file.title: QUEST
help-file.content:
General Information.
Currently quests exist on Duris in several different forms. The first includes quests that are built into the game. They may be quests for information, reward, items, spells, and other various things. Such quests have quest mobs in the game. These are monster who have information concerning the quest. In order to obtain the information you must ask or tell the monster some key word which will trigger a response. That response may be followed by more key words, etc. A monster or mob may require a specific item which he will reward you for with information, rewards, or a spell. The gods on Duris will NOT reveal information about these mobs. It is up to you to find them. The second form of quest is run by the gods themselves. It is usually a story that they will tell and groups must be formed to solve it. The quests are for FUN. The sole idea behind doing a quest is NOT a reward. The gods have taken their own time to create something different and exciting for the mud. Be grateful. Because these quests are run by the gods, they have the power to do what they desire and that may include changing the form of the quest.
